name: Salem in the Sky - GMTK 2021
description:
... Salem in the Sky

Salem the cat and his witch owner Sybil are flying through the air together; Sybil on broom and Salem on a scarf.

Please leave a comment and rate our game! Also, post your scores, our highest score was 134 :)

Tutorial 
  • W: Move Sybil up
  • S: Move Sybil Down
  • Space: Throw/ catch Salem the cat
